sourcesContent:
<template>
  <!-- Header Page -->
  <!-- Section -->
  <section></section>
</template>

<script>
export default {

  props: ['inventory', 'addToCart'],

  computed: {
    // get data by id
    pastry () {
      const pastry = this.inventory.find((p) => {
        return p.name === this.$route.params.id
      })
      return pastry
    },

    // find pastry index
    pastryIndex () {
      const index = this.inventory.findIndex((p) => {
        return p.name === this.$route.params.id
      })
      return index
    }
  }

}
</script>
